title: Foreign Language Didactics (German Language)
banerDescription: Gain qualifications to teach German at primary and secondary school levels, developing your methodological and didactic competencies.
description:
• Teachers wishing to obtain qualifications to teach German at the second and third educational stages
  • Individuals interested in German language teaching methodology
  • Specialists looking to expand their competencies in German language didactics
description2: The postgraduate studies in "Didactics and Methodology of Foreign Language - German" are specially designed for teachers who wish to acquire the skills necessary to teach German at the second and third educational stages. The main goal of these studies is to develop methodological and didactic competencies that will enable effective teaching of the German language.
description3: The program includes acquiring methodological knowledge in various methods and techniques of teaching German, which can be adapted to work with students in grades IV-VIII in primary schools and secondary schools. The education in these studies also includes deepening knowledge and skills in psychology and pedagogy, which are essential for effective didactic and educational work.
description4: Graduates of the program will gain not only qualifications but also practical competencies necessary for teaching German at primary and secondary school levels.

topics.title: Theories of Learning and Teaching German
Methodology of Foreign Language Teaching at the Second Educational Stage
Methodology of Foreign Language Teaching at the Third Educational Stage
Professional Development of Foreign Language Teachers

faculty: Classes are conducted by experienced practitioners in the field of German language teaching methodology, with many years of experience working with students at various educational stages.
practices:
• Professional practice includes 90 hours and allows gaining experience in teaching German.
  • Internships can be carried out in primary and secondary schools.
evaluation: The assessment of learning outcomes is based on activity during classes, completion of individual modules, implementation of internships, and preparation of a diploma thesis.
jobOpportunities:
Graduates of the program will be prepared to work as:

  • German language teachers in primary and secondary schools
  • German language instructors in language schools
  • Language education specialists
  • Methodological consultants in German language teaching
  • Employees of cultural institutions promoting German language and culture
invite: Gain the qualifications and skills necessary to teach German and inspire students to discover a new language and culture.
